short_summary: Request for Proposals for Category 6 Office Furniture
full_summary:
**Project Title**

WS4458215393: Category 6 Office Furniture - National Capital Region

**Category**

* 56101700: Office furniture

**Procurement Method**

* Competitive - Open bidding

**Description**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposals on behalf of Health Canada to procure, deliver, and install Category 6 office furniture to the National Capital Region.

**Important Timeline**

* Tender closing date: June 19, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EDT (notable changes to the closing time)
* The bidding process and documents are accessible through a SAP Ariba account

**Eligibility and Selection Criteria**

* Bid submissions will be evaluated based on the lowest price
* Bidders must submit all required documents and meet all contract requirements to be considered

**Contracting Entity**

* Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC)
* Contact Information: Sherrise Ettienne (she/her) at sherrise.ettienne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important Documents**

* The full invitation to tender and supporting documentation are available through a SAP Ariba account
* Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting and CanadaBuys posting closing times

**Notice URL**

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19844873?extsite=MTk4NDQ4NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
